techme 0.1.0
  • 参考
  • 文章
    机构信息库 Techme数据集

函数参考

Data Subset from the Agriculture Yearbook

Data sets assembled from the Agriculture Yearbook（农业统计年鉴）.

AgriFertilizer
Data Set of Agricultural Fertilizer
AgriMachine
Data Set of Agricultural Machine
AgriPesticide
Data Set of Agricultural Pesticide
AgriPlastic
Data Set of Agricultural Plastic

Data Subset from the Technology Yearbook

Data sets assembled from the Technology Yearbook（科技统计年鉴）. While PublicBudget source from the National Yearbook, and HitechFirmsPub source from the public site.

HitechFirmsPub
Data Set of Hi-tech Firms Numbers on Public Site
IndustryOperation
Data Set of Hi-tech Industry Operation
IndustryRD
Data Set of Hi-tech Industry RD
IndustryTrade
Data Set of Hi-tech Industry Trade
MarketPull
Data Set of Tech Market Trade (Pull Effect)
MarketPush
Data Set of Tech Market Trade (Push Effect)
RDActivity
Data Set of RD Activity
RDIntense
Data Set of RD Intense
PublicBudget
Data Set of Public Budget

Data Subset from the public sources

Data sets assembled from the public sources, including MOA（农业农村部）, MOST（科技部）, MOE（教育部） et. al.

PubAgriParkList
Details of Approved List of National Agricultural Sci-tech Park
PubAgriParkCheck
Details of Checking result of National Agricultural Sci-tech Park
PubAgriParkEval
Details of Evaluation result of National Agricultural Sci-tech Park
PubCars
Details Data Frame of China Agricultural Research System (CARS)
PubNKRDP
Details of National Key R&D Plans(NKRDP)
PubObsStation
Details list of Observe Stations of MOA and MOE
PubObsStationX
Details list of Observe Stations from departments( MOA/MOE/MOST)
PubSKLMost
Details of Stated Key Lab (SKL)

Data Subset for the special chapter

Data sets focus on special topics, including livestocks（畜牧业） et. al.

PubBreedingXmj
Details of Officer Livestock Breeding List from MOA (Xmj)
PubStandardXmj
Details of Officer Livestock Standard List from MOA (Xmj)
LivestockBreeding
Date Set of Livestock Breeding

Some elementary dataset used in the report

Basic information needed for data handling and report writing, including Provinces, Regions, district, et. al.

varsList
Basic vars table
ProvinceCity
Data Set of Province and City of China
BasicCountriesRegion
Data Set of Countries and Regions
BasicDistrict
Data Set of District information of China
BasicProvince
Data Set of Basic Province information
BasicTelAreaCode
Data Set of Telephone area code information of China
BasicTelcode
Data Set of Telephone area code information of China
queryTianyan
Data Set of Institution Query from Tianyan Site

Functions for raw data handling.

various funtions help to data cleaning, computation,summarising, et. al.

add_footer_asis()
Add success footer information as whole part for the figure or table
add_footer_pure()
Add success footer information item to item for the figure or table
convert_xls_as_xlsx()
Convert xls to xlsx
convert_xls_to_xlsx()
Helper function: convert_xls_to_xlsx
delete_registry()
Helper function: delete_registry
document_dt()
Help Document the Variables List of Data Set for Package Development
gen_dirs_vec()
Generate batch directories
get_excelcnv_exe()
Helper function: get_excelcnv_exe
get_province_of_institution()
Helper Function to match and get province of target institution
get_vars()
Get names from basic variables table
gg2xlsx()
Export chunk plot to editable xlsx file
safe_office_folder()
Helper function: safe_office_folder

该页面

开发者： Kevin Hu.

该网站由 pkgdown 2.0.7 构建。
